В связи с последним обновлением моё мнение о игре очень сильно изменилось, "АНТИЧИТ" начал работать более корректно, подбор игры так и не изменился...
Игра так и оставляет желать лучшего но... сейчас она изменилась в лучшую сторону!

7/10...

Yes and no. This game has a SERIOUS cheating problem, unless you have prime as well as high trust factor. Even then you have a lot of closet and legit cheaters. Unless Valve fixes the VAC this game is only "Okay". So it's fun when you have no cheaters but that's pretty rare.

Игра превратилась в помойку

tried to start a game, get a team all russians, when we lost the first five rounds one leftand wegot no bot so it was 4v5 and we lost the whole game. Next game i got my pc did not connect in time of the warm up so i got kicked and recived a two hour cooldown.
dont ever try to solo queue unless you are in higher ranks and if you are looking for a real experience the free verision is unplayable cus of the cheater problem.
it is a fun game but it only gets fun in that specific cenario and unless you are a god while aiming or can have real teamwork that works this game is just furiating.
i dont like it but i still come back to prove to try to prove to myself that im atleast decent at shooters.
kötü oyunculardan büyük ihtimalle kanser olacaksınız.

Игра вобрала в себя всё лучшее от Counter-Strike: Source и Counter-Strike 1.6, прибавив в динамике, графике да и в геймплее в целом, с различными интересными плюшками в виде официальных новых режимов игры, карт, оружии и внимании в деталям. Следующая эпоха CS, которая однозначно затмит предыдущие.
Данной видео игре - место у параши >:(
good game, but lots of cheaters
Ну что могу сказать... хуита оно и так понятно
Super sonic ultra tryhard good game

Valve, you are not allowed to ruin one of our best childhood memories by sheer negligence. This game is addictive because of it's simple yet infinite learning curve. Toxic community, hackers galore, and an outdated engine makes for a very triggering game.

Just play with your friends, that way your will still have a soul by the time you are done with your competitive match.

Oh, and btw, I can't dislike CS:GO, it might trigger me to death, but forever a fan. This franchise has been revolutionary. (I hate to say this, but..) Thank you Valve.
havent played this game in 10 years but i think its great. i do like source

Если запишите меня на турнир, то просто лайк шер игре
это игра просто офигенная если понять как тут всё устроено
